name: part_009
file: tmp_【 #百鬼あやめ7周年新衣装3D 】百鬼あやめ７周年記念ライブ  ～天女繚華～ 【百鬼あやめ⧸ホロライブ】 [uRa-uLMea7w]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_009.mov

scenes.description: Nakiri Ayame performs the song 'Togetsukyou ~Kimi Omou~' on a traditional Japanese-themed stage.
Nakiri Ayame talks to the audience about the 'Japanese style' theme of her live concert and shows off her new matching microphone.

subtitles.original:
渡月橋 ～君 想ふ～
作詞：Mai Kuraki　作曲：Akihito Tokunaga
subtitles.english:
Togetsukyo ~Kimi Omou~
Lyrics: Mai Kuraki, Composition: Akihito Tokunaga

subtitles.original: 寄り添う二人に君がオーバーラップ
subtitles.english: You overlap with the two of us close together

subtitles.original: 色なき風に思い馳せて
subtitles.english: Letting my thoughts fly in the colorless wind

subtitles.original: 触れた手の温もり今も
subtitles.english: The warmth of the hand I touched even now...

subtitles.original: Stop 時間を止めて
subtitles.english: Stop, please stop time

subtitles.original: そういつの日だって
subtitles.english: Yes, no matter what day it is

subtitles.original: 君の言葉忘れないの
subtitles.english: I will not forget your words

subtitles.original: 会いたい時に会えない
subtitles.english: I can't see you when I want to see you

subtitles.original: 会いたい時に会えない
subtitles.english: I can't see you when I want to see you

subtitles.original: 切なくて もどかしい
subtitles.english: It's painful and frustrating

subtitles.original: から紅に染まる渡月橋
subtitles.english: Togetsukyo bridge dyed in deep crimson

subtitles.original: 導かれる日願って
subtitles.english: Wishing for the day I'm guided

subtitles.original: 川の流れに祈りを込めて
subtitles.english: Putting a prayer into the river's flow

subtitles.original: I've been thinking about you
subtitles.english: I've been thinking about you

subtitles.original: I've been thinking about you
subtitles.english: I've been thinking about you

subtitles.original: いつも こころ 君のそば
subtitles.english: Always, my heart is by your side

subtitles.original: いにしえの景色変わりなく
subtitles.english: The ancient scenery remains unchanged

subtitles.original: 今この瞳に映し出す
subtitles.english: Reflected in these eyes now

subtitles.original: 彩りゆく季節越えて
subtitles.english: Passing through the seasons that turn colorful

subtitles.original: 覚えてますか
subtitles.english: Do you remember?

subtitles.original: ねぇいつになったら
subtitles.english: Hey, when will it be...

subtitles.original: また巡り会えるのかな
subtitles.english: ...that we can meet again?

subtitles.original: 会いたい時に会えない
subtitles.english: I can't see you when I want to see you

subtitles.original: 会いたい時に会えない
subtitles.english: I can't see you when I want to see you

subtitles.original: この胸を焦がすの
subtitles.english: It burns my heart

subtitles.original: から紅に水くくるとき
subtitles.english: When the water is bound by deep crimson

subtitles.original: 君との想いつなげて
subtitles.english: Connecting my feelings with you

subtitles.original: 川の流れに祈りを込めて
subtitles.english: Putting a prayer into the river's flow

subtitles.original: I've been thinking about you
subtitles.english: I've been thinking about you

subtitles.original: I've been thinking about you
subtitles.english: I've been thinking about you

subtitles.original: いつも 君を探してる
subtitles.english: I'm always searching for you

subtitles.original: 君となら不安さえ
subtitles.english: With you, even anxiety...

subtitles.original: どんな時も消えてゆくよ
subtitles.english: ...will disappear at any time

subtitles.original: いつになったら優しく
subtitles.english: When will I be able to...

subtitles.original: 抱きしめられるのかな
subtitles.english: ...be embraced gently?

subtitles.original: から紅の紅葉達さえ
subtitles.english: Even the crimson autumn leaves...

subtitles.original: 熱い思いを告げては
subtitles.english: ...tell of their passionate feelings

subtitles.original: ゆらり揺れて歌っています
subtitles.english: Gently swaying and singing

subtitles.original: I've been thinking about you
subtitles.english: I've been thinking about you

subtitles.original: I've been thinking about you
subtitles.english: I've been thinking about you

subtitles.original: いつも いつも 君想ふ
subtitles.english: Always, always, I think of you

subtitles.original: いつも いつも 君想ふ
subtitles.english: Always, always, I think of you

subtitles.original: はい！というわけでここまではどうでしたでしょうか？
subtitles.english: Yes! So, how did you like this part?

subtitles.original: いや、もう数多くのゲストに出ていただいて、余は本当に嬉しいです！
subtitles.english: Wow, I'm really happy that so many guests appeared!

subtitles.original: 本当に今回のライブは最初にも言ったんですけど、ちょっと和風な感じでまとめさせていただいたので。
subtitles.english: As I said at the beginning, I put together this live concert with a Japanese-style theme.

subtitles.original: 曲ももうほぼほぼ全部和風っぽい感じで、
subtitles.english: Almost all the songs were Japanese-style,

subtitles.original: ちょっと雰囲気をね、一つに統一して今回はライブを作らせていただきました。
subtitles.english: so I created this live by unifying the atmosphere into one.

subtitles.original: そして、みんな気づいたかな？ちょっと歌ってる最中、ちょっと気づきました？これ。
subtitles.english: And did everyone notice? Did you notice while I was singing? This.

subtitles.original: お、気づきました？新しいマイクなんですよ！すごいでしょ？
subtitles.english: Oh, did you notice? It's a new microphone! Isn't it amazing?

subtitles.original: すごいでしょ？え、見て見て！この、ちょっとこの、わかりますか？
subtitles.english: Amazing, right? Look, look! Can you see this?

subtitles.original: このお腹の柄とちょっとお揃いなんですよ！
subtitles.english: It matches the pattern on my stomach!

subtitles.original: ちょっとこっちも、あ、見えるかな？見える？
subtitles.english: This side too... can you see it? Can you?
